meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cheesy.
meanings.sent1: The cheesinesses of the movie made it hard to watch.
meanings.sent2: I can't handle the cheesinesses of those love songs.
meanings.sent3: The cheesinesses of the romantic scene made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was filled with cheesinesses that made us all roll our eyes.
meanings.sent5: The cheesinesses of the play left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being overly sentimental or corny.
meanings.sent1: The cheesinesses of the card brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: His jokes always have a touch of cheesinesses to them.
meanings.sent3: The cheesinesses of the situation made us all burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The cheesinesses of their relationship was like something out of a movie.
meanings.sent5: The cheesinesses of the song lyrics resonated with the listeners.
